sentences.en: Did any of them react to a goal from side with passivity?
sentences.cn: 他们中的哪个人在看到比赛的任何一方有进球的时候,反应很冷淡?

sentences.en: Hormonal aspects of passivity and aggressiveness in boys.
sentences.cn: 研究男孩身上的消极以及积极的荷尔蒙问题.

sentences.en: However, are also less attractive reasons for public passivity.
sentences.cn: 然而, 对于公众的这种消极情绪,还有一些不那么积极的因素在.

sentences.en: I had always been bothered by the passivity of the ghetto.
sentences.cn: 黑人区的消极顺从向来使我不安.

sentences.en: If we assume that our efforts are unrelated to the outcomes in our lives we develop an outlook of pessimism and passivity.
sentences.cn: 如果我们假设自己的付出与成果无关，那么我们就衍生出悲观和被动的观念。

sentences.en: It is the opposite of static, laze , and passivity.
sentences.cn: 自我表达和静止 、 散漫、被动是恰恰相反的.

sentences.en: Kill poison to arrive from passivity active defence.
sentences.cn: 从被动杀毒到主动防御.

sentences.en: Recently, some county has an officer, bring about working passivity because of devoid appeal force.
sentences.cn: 最近, 某县有位乡长, 因为缺乏号召力而导致工作被动.

sentences.en: Service consciousness has intense with dim cent, have active the cent with passivity.
sentences.cn: 服务意识有强烈与淡漠之分, 有主动与被动之分.

sentences.en: She met his eagerness with that smiling, tantalizing passivity.
sentences.cn: 她以笑盈盈的 、 半推半就的姿态对付他那热切的情意.

sentences.en: Some people get off on brutalizing others, and passivity makes you a target.
sentences.cn: 有些人自认为可以对他人蛮横, 而逆来顺受就会使你成为其目标.

sentences.en: Such is the interrelation between initiative and passivity, between superiority and inferiority.
sentences.cn: 这就是主动和被动之间 、 优势和劣势之间的相互关系.

sentences.en: Such superiority or inferiority is the objective basis of initiative or passivity.
sentences.cn: 这种优势或劣势，是主动或被动的客观基矗。

sentences.en: Television , says Klompus, contributes to children's passivity.
sentences.cn: 她认为这是因为什么也不要求孩子们去做的缘故.

sentences.en: These local successes will add up to strategic superiority and initiative for us and strategic inferiority and passivity for the enemy.
sentences.cn: 把这些局部的东西集合起来，就成了我们的战略优势和战略主动，敌人的战略劣势和战略被动。

sentences.en: This conception of the " passivity " of intellect is perhaps the greatest barrier to philosophical thinking.
sentences.cn: 这种心智 “ 被动 ” 观可能是哲学思考的最大障碍.

sentences.en: This paper proposed a linear quadratic performance target based on passivity considerations.
sentences.cn: 该文基于无源性控制思想,提出一种二次型性能指标.

sentences.en: We must transform passivity into initiative.

words.tran_cn: 被动的，消极的；被动语态的
